title: Blu-Berries and the Korner Kaff
description: Sophia, a Princeton University student, on her junior year abroad, discovers an unusual berry bush in Africa. Its bright blue berries prove to be powerful aphrodisiacs. Perhaps she could feed them to her date to ensure a great evening? Eventually, without their help, she marries Big Bob who has control of a whole county in the Midwest. They have two children and the story moves forwards to our day with is a humorous description of how the Korner Kaff got its name, and describes the goings on of the patrons in their caf√©,how Big Bob copes secretly with the terrible burden of his family being incredibly wealthy, and the plans Sophia has fopr the commercial sale of the Blu-Berry juice.
author: Peter Watson Jenkins
